DataElement.preferredName: Additional Pathology Chronic Pancreatitis Finding Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the indicator for additional pathologic findings related the inflammation of the pancreas that persists or progresses over a long period of time.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to additional pathologic findings related the inflammation of the pancreas that persists or progresses over a long period of time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Added; extra. (from American Heritage Dictionary):A specialty concerned with the nature and cause of disease as expressed by changes in cellular or tissue structure and function caused by the disease process. (MSH98)

Concepts.definition: The medical science, and specialty practice, concerned with all aspects of disease, but with special reference to the essential nature, causes, and development of abnormal conditions, as well as the structural and functional changes that result from the disease processes. Informally used to mean the result of such an examination.

Property.preferredDefinition: A disease or condition that persists or progresses over a long period of time.:Inflammation of the pancreas. Chronic pancreatitis may cause diabetes and problems with digestion. Pain is the primary symptom.:Clinical manifestations that can be either objective when observed by a physician, or subjective when perceived by the patient.

Concepts.definition: Usually used to describe a condition that is persistent and long standing.
Clinical, laboratory or molecular evidence, or absence of evidence of disease.

ConceptualDomain.preferredName: Chronic or Associated Diseases and Exposures
ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: chronic diseases, as well as diseases and exposures associated with cancer.

DataElementConcept.origin: RTOG CRF:Radiation Therapy Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: an event, entity or condition that typically characterizes the additional pathologic findings.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated to add NCIt concept relationship. Updated VM Short Name to be the Public ID to be consistent with current convention for VM Short Name - DW 10-03-2022
ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The finding is not present, but a value of 'none' cannot be unequivocally established absence in the current context.

Concepts.definition: The finding is not present, but a value of 'none' cannot be unequivocally established absence in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.origin: RTOG CRF:Radiation Therapy Oncology Group Case Report Form

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF_TEXT1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have active or chronic pancreatitis based on lipase evaluation, symptoms, and radiographic findings?
